scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@sip-client-2:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@sipp-client-2:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=sip-boundary-s0pzi0rxiN Content-Length: [len]
--sip-boundary-s0pzi0rxiN Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=mkd 1707403848 1 IN IP4 10.114.1.8 s=protei c=IN IP4 10.114.1.8 t=0 0 m=audio 23124 RTP/AVP 8 a=inactive
--sip-boundary-s0pzi0rxiN Content-Type: application/pidf+xml Content-Disposition:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dm="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:data-model" xmlns:gp="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:gs="http://www.opengis.net/pidflo/1.0" xmlns:cl="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10:civicLoc" xmlns:fias="http://www.svetets.ru/fias" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf xsd/presence.xsd" entity="79876031020"> <dm:device id="C6196E72-B103-453B-B2FF-X79876031020"> <gp:geopriv> <gp:location-info> <gml:location> <gs:Circle srsName="urn:ogc:def:crs:EPSG::4326"> <gml:pos>55.9508 54.7276</gml:pos> <gs:radius uom="urn:ogc:def:uom:EPSG::9001">109</gs:radius> </gs:Circle> </gml:location> </gp:location-info> </gp:geopriv> <dm:deviceID>102079876031020</dm:deviceID> <dm:timestamp>2024-02-08T14:56:42Z</dm:timestamp> </dm:device> </presence>
--sip-boundary-s0pzi0rxiN Content-Type: text/plain;charset=UTF-8 Content-Disposition: form-data;name="part"
Какие-то строки на русском or in English --sip-boundary-s0pzi0rxiN--

ACK sip:sip-client-2:[remote_port];transport=UDP SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Route: [routes] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@sipp-client-2:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@sip-client-2:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Route: [routes] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@sipp-client-2:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
